Package com.hiddenswitch.spellsource

Interface Invites

  • public interface Invites
    This service allows players to invite each other to private games.

      • sendInvite

        static void sendInvite​(@NotNull
                       com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.client.models.Invite invite)
                throws co.paralleluniverse.fibers.SuspendExecution
        Sends the invite to both users on it across the Connection.

        Mutates the incoming invite if it's Invite.StatusEnum.UNDELIVERED.

        Parameters:
        invite -
        Throws:
        co.paralleluniverse.fibers.SuspendExecution

      • accept

        @NotNull
static com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.client.models.AcceptInviteResponse accept​(@NotNull
                                                                              InviteId inviteId,
                                                                              @NotNull
                                                                              com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.client.models.AcceptInviteRequest request,
                                                                              @NotNull
                                                                              UserRecord recipient)
                                                                       throws co.paralleluniverse.fibers.SuspendExecution,
                                                                              java.lang.InterruptedException
        Accepts an invite.

        • If it's a matchmaking invitation, the user will automatically be put into a matchmaking queue and will wait.
        • If it's a friend invitation, the user will do a mutual friend adding.
        Parameters:
        inviteId - The invite to accept
        request - The request
        recipient - The user executing the request
        Returns:
        An updated invite and potentially information about the new friend or game.
        Throws:
        co.paralleluniverse.fibers.SuspendExecution
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • deleteInvite

        @NotNull
static com.hiddenswitch.spellsource.client.models.InviteResponse deleteInvite​(@NotNull
                                                                              InviteId inviteId,
                                                                              @NotNull
                                                                              UserId userId)
                                                                       throws co.paralleluniverse.fibers.SuspendExecution
        Deletes the invite only if it is pending or undelivered. Other kinds of invites cannot be deleted.

        This will cancel the invite, or reject it if the recipient is deleting it.

        Parameters:
        inviteId -
        userId -
        Returns:
        Throws:
        co.paralleluniverse.fibers.SuspendExecution
